review: Really love the fire stick.  Easy to use and setup.
author: H. Lyons

review: Actually was a true waste. Most tvs already come with all of these options. Not to mention almost everyoption was a PAY option. Enh not excited with it al all.
author: Eriberto Franqui "Health Nut"

review: Good Product....I have been using this one for the past 1-2 weeks and its been good as of now....no sluggnishness, no crash....boot time is little bit  longer, but thats not a big deal...nice colorful interface.....good choices of app and games, though i mainly use YuppTV....
author: Sunil Tharavath

review: This item is just as listed, works very well
author: James W.

review: Works great! The Fire Stick turns my tv into a smart tv.  I also love that it will mirror my Kindle. I love how small and compact it is too!!
author: Natlynn Patton

review: Decided to try the Fire TV Stick to stream Netflix. Very easy setup, only took about 3 minutes! I was concerned it wouldn't work well since our Internet service is a bit flaky, but I've been using it about a week and so far it works great! I haven't used it for Netflix yet, because I have Amazon Prime and there are plenty of movies and other things to watch. I would highly recommend this product!
author: Linda
